text: heliri; allahanu tanna dasarigagi utpadisiruva alankara samagrigalannu mattu sud'dha ahara vastugalannu nisedhisiruvavaru yaru? Heliri; ihalokadalli ivu visvasigalige sam'matavagive â€“ paralokadallantu ivu avarigende misalagiruttave. I riti navu arivu ullavarigagi nam'ma vacanagalannu vivarisutteve
